About me

I'm currently immersed in the exciting journey of learning to code, and I must say, it's been quite an exhilarating experience. Beyond the screen, I find solace and enjoyment in the greens of the golf course. Golfing has become not just a hobby but a cherished pastime, offering a refreshing escape and a chance to unwind.
